p: This document was developed on behalf of the “Principles of Care Committee,” and approved by the board of directors. The PedANP is an independent affiliate of the American Association of Naturopathic Physicians, which represents and advocates for advancement of the naturopathic profession in the United States. The mission of the PedANP is to expand and disseminate knowledge about best practices in naturopathic medical care for the pediatric population, to elevate the standard of pediatric care and education in naturopathic medical programs and the profession as a whole. Elected members of the board of the PedANP are experts in the field of naturopathic pediatrics who practice in a range of clinical and academic settings.
